channel.title: Please help me!( runescape server help)
channel.description:
Hello. I have been seeking runescape server help for quit some time now. One of my friends suggested this website to me. I tryed moparscape's servers, and the work of some of these people are amazing! Now, heres my question for the programmers: i have a lot of experience in many programing languages. I have no experience in server devlopment. I though it would be a good experiance if me and a few friends attempted to program a runescape server. We dont care about posting it as much as we do in completing it. Can anyone instruct me in the devlopment of a runescape server? I would be very apprictative. It would be of a signifigant help if you could give me as muc assistance, (without doign the project aspossible. Im sorry to keep you waiting, ill be constantly checkign this fom for a response. It would be of convience if you would possibly e-mail me at amassaia@gmail.com
Well i cant thank you enough, Thanks for your time :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes:

item.title: Please help me!( runescape server help)
item.dc:creator: @am159 am159
item.description:
@am159 wrote:

tico, thanks for the advice, is java easy to learn?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2008, 07:32:18 PM[/size][hr]both of your tips have been very useful, but can u tell me what to put in each file and how to organize them? i already started java, thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2008, 04:16:11 PM[/size][hr]i got my server started, how do i make items automatically respawn and how do i make npc’s talk?

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me!( runescape server help)

Now tico, your a great example of a good member on this forum… i wish everyone would be like you.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me!( runescape server help)

item.title: Please help me!( runescape server help)
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

There are two server guides on this site. They are both great, and both work. The links are below.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Making a server will not do anything, if you are unable to code. Private servers are coded in Java, and sometimes even C+/C++. Honestly, I have no experience with C++ so I couldn’t tell you where to learn. However, I’m sure a quick search on google would to the trick. I find coding a server in Java to be a lot easier. I also thought it was pretty easy to learn the basics.

Since the “Java Basics” threads have mostly been removed, here are the links in which you can learn about Basic Java, and Basic Java Programming Conventions, both by Lothy.

I wish you luck learning Java, and making a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me!( runescape server help)
item.dc:creator: @mackel mackel
item.description:
@mackel wrote:

Well to get started you might want to go and find a good tutorial if you wish to make a server, and then after your done with that you can get some good sources from the downloads section, and theres a new thing called silabs which is a little more modern with the latest runecape items which is pretty cool, so if you want that , you also go to downloads section and look for a silabs-compatible source.

Read full topic
